revised_title: W. H. Wollaston's Manuscripts and Contributions to Science
tldr: This article discusses the manuscripts and contributions of William Hyde Wollaston, a prominent chemist, astronomer, and botanist. It highlights his early life, education, and scientific achievements, including his work on chemical analysis, microscopy, and his interest in astronomy and botany. Wollaston's dedication to his studies and his strict adherence to his principles are also emphasized.
